Quote.Author: Victor Garber
Quote.QuoteValue: The hardest thing for me is not to keep laughing. Jennifer particularly is like a clown

Quote.Author: Victor Garber
Quote.QuoteValue: The stage is where I feel most comfortable, and I miss it all the time

Quote.Author: Victor LaValle
Quote.QuoteValue: Lonely women destroy themselves; lonely men threaten the world

Quote.Author: Victor LaValle
Quote.QuoteValue: When I find the right information, the Web is a blessing; when I don't, it's a distraction

Quote.Author: Victor LaValle
Quote.QuoteValue: My three obsessions are mental illness, horror and religion

Quote.Author: Victor LaValle
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear warps our understanding of reality and even our ability to see reality clearly

Quote.Author: Victor LaValle
Quote.QuoteValue: I know that many authors say editors don't edit anymore, but that's not been true in my experience

Quote.Author: Victor LaValle
Quote.QuoteValue: Try imagining James Joyce not writing about being a Catholic

Quote.Author: Victor LaValle
Quote.QuoteValue: It's tough to write beautifully about ugly things, but Mitchell S. Jackson makes it look easy

Quote.Author: Victor LaValle
Quote.QuoteValue: I spend lots of time on the Web, some of it even useful

Quote.Author: Victor LaValle
Quote.QuoteValue: In the end, what's any good reader really hoping for? That spark. That spell. That journey

Quote.Author: Victor LaValle
Quote.QuoteValue: 'The Sundial' is written with the kind of humor that would make a guillotine laugh

Quote.Author: Victor Ponta
Quote.QuoteValue: Romania strongly supports Turkey's E.U. accession

Quote.Author: Victor Ponta
Quote.QuoteValue: Reducing debt through budgetary consolidation is essential to restoring Europe's financial health

Quote.Author: Victor Ponta
Quote.QuoteValue: My government has promised to comprehensively respect the independence of the judiciary

Quote.Author: Victor Ponta
Quote.QuoteValue: NATO remains the cornerstone of Atlantic security

Quote.Author: Victor Ponta
Quote.QuoteValue: Uncertainty is normal in the first few days of a new government

Quote.Author: Victor Ponta
Quote.QuoteValue: All children should have equal opportunities

Quote.Author: Victor Ponta
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a committed European; a united Europe is Romania's future

Quote.Author: Victor Ponta
Quote.QuoteValue: You should see all the negative things that the Romanian press writes about me

Quote.Author: Victor Ponta
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no breach of European rules committed by companies from Romania or on Romanian territory

Quote.Author: Victor Ponta
Quote.QuoteValue: Poland is much more advanced than Romania in structural reforms

Quote.Author: Victoria Abril
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep your ears open, your eyes open, grab everything you can, react, and learn!

Quote.Author: Victoria Abril
Quote.QuoteValue: You can fake your age or mask it, but the passion that moves the characters has to be real

Quote.Author: Victoria Abril
Quote.QuoteValue: I like men with some belly who are a little over the hill

Quote.Author: Victoria Abril
Quote.QuoteValue: My only friends were boys, and I was just one more of them

Quote.Author: Victoria Abril
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd heard it was dangerous to walk around Miami

Quote.Author: Victoria Abril
Quote.QuoteValue: My current companion, Gerard de Battista, is the father of my two sons

Quote.Author: Victoria Abril
Quote.QuoteValue: My first vocation was dance

Quote.Author: Victoria Abril
Quote.QuoteValue: People love coming on television, even if they have to show their miseries

Quote.Author: Victoria Abril
Quote.QuoteValue: Psychiatrists don't solve anything from one day to the next

Quote.Author: Victoria Abril
Quote.QuoteValue: The director had come to Madrid to court me

Quote.Author: Victoria Azarenka
Quote.QuoteValue: My grandmother is the person who inspires me the most

Quote.Author: Victoria Azarenka
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll never be like a Barbie girl, that's for sure

Quote.Author: Victoria Azarenka
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot be in pretend for people to like you

Quote.Author: Victoria Azarenka
Quote.QuoteValue: I have learned how to better handle things as they come

Quote.Author: Victoria Azarenka
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to have fun

Quote.Author: Victoria Azarenka
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really care how I sound

Quote.Author: Victoria Azarenka
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always honest

Quote.Author: Victoria Azarenka
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to go shopping, to the movies, all the girl stuff. Just a normal girl

Quote.Author: Victoria Azarenka
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like when the task is more difficult for me it's more exciting

Quote.Author: Victoria Azarenka
Quote.QuoteValue: I always take things step by step and match by match

Quote.Author: Victoria Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always loved fashion since I was a kid and customized my school uniforms

Quote.Author: Victoria Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very realistic. I know my boundaries - I know what I'm good at and what I'm not good at

Quote.Author: Victoria Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: I want a big house with a moat and dragons and a fort to keep people out

Quote.Author: Victoria Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: I love fashion, and that's how I express myself

Quote.Author: Victoria Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: If you haven't got it. Fake it! Too short? Wear big high heels, but do practice walking!

Quote.Author: Victoria Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: I keep fit by running after my three boys all day

Quote.Author: Victoria Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not materialistic. I believe in presents from the heart, like a drawing that a child does

Quote.Author: Victoria Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very proud to be British, and my brand is British

Quote.Author: Victoria Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a control freak. I am very hands on and pay attention to details

Quote.Author: Victoria Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: My aim is to create the perfect dress!

Quote.Author: Victoria Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I always dreamed of being Maria in The Sound of Music

Quote.Author: Victoria Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Because I hate fake people and I always think I'm never fake

Quote.Author: Victoria Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I like to vent

Quote.Author: Victoria Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I remember going to church about four times a week. I liked it a lot

Quote.Author: Victoria Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe entertainment is not supposed to be reality

Quote.Author: Victoria Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had a lot of struggles and I would be in a lot of trouble, I think, if I wasn't a Christian

Quote.Author: Victoria Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think abortion is murder

Quote.Author: Victoria Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: They're desperately searching for meaning in their lives but they will not crack the Bible open

Quote.Author: Victoria Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: It doesn't make your life stop being fun to be a Christian

Quote.Author: Victoria Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been in the music industry, only acting

Quote.Author: Victoria Justice
Quote.QuoteValue: It's nice to just embrace the natural beauty within you

Quote.Author: Victoria Justice
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone wants me to be perfect, but I am so far from perfect!

Quote.Author: Victoria Justice
Quote.QuoteValue: So many girls only care about guys and looking good all the time

Quote.Author: Victoria Justice
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be able to unleash your inner goofball with me

Quote.Author: Victoria Justice
Quote.QuoteValue: I love fashion and there is no easier way to express yourself than through the clothes you wear

Quote.Author: Victoria Justice
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have to wear any other makeup as long as I have blush

Quote.Author: Victoria Justice
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to dress for my body type and for my coloring

Quote.Author: Victoria Justice
Quote.QuoteValue: I think prom is just about enjoying yourself

Quote.Author: Victoria Justice
Quote.QuoteValue: Guys don't like girls that throw themselves at them. That's something that I've learned

Quote.Author: Victoria Justice
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be the type of person to have my relationships plastered in magazines

Quote.Author: Victoria Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not perfect, but what's wonderful about eating a plant-based diet is, I don't have to be

Quote.Author: Victoria Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: We all live with blinders on. They come with having a personal vantage point

Quote.Author: Victoria Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big believer in living life as an extended working vacation

Quote.Author: Victoria Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty at 70 years old isn't the same as beauty at 20 years old, but it is stunning nonetheless

Quote.Author: Victoria Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: On the issue of abortion, I'm ever on the fence, or, at most, an inch or two to either side

Quote.Author: Victoria Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: My calling, as one imperfect human, is to celebrate and uphold life every time I get the chance

Quote.Author: Victoria Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: You're supposed to be using your gifts and fulfilling your dreams, at every age

Quote.Author: Victoria Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: Recreational shopping is the shortest distance between two points: you and broke

Quote.Author: Victoria Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: Moderation is actually the flip side of dieting, that is, imposed deprivation

Quote.Author: Victoria Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to strive to go two steps forward and realize that, sometimes, there will be one step back

Quote.Author: Victoria Pendleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I worried I was a boyish shape. I always thought I might grow some, but it never happened

Quote.Author: Victoria Pendleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm definitely capable of just enjoying riding my bike these days

Quote.Author: Victoria Pendleton
Quote.QuoteValue: There have been a lot of moments in my career when things haven't gone to plan

Quote.Author: Victoria Pendleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I naturally favour a clean, healthy diet. A salad sandwich is one of my favourite meals!

Quote.Author: Victoria Pendleton
Quote.QuoteValue: The sprint is sometimes like a toss of a coin. Sometimes it's heads, and sometimes it's tails

Quote.Author: Victoria Pendleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I might become a pescatarian. I love sushi, couldn't give it up

Quote.Author: Victoria Pendleton
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning is no longer just the outcome. It's part of the process

Quote.Author: Victoria Pendleton
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh, I am an angel, though sometimes I wish I was more of a devil

Quote.Author: Victoria Pendleton
Quote.QuoteValue: The sponsorship offers have been amazing. I have to turn down a lot

Quote.Author: Victoria Pendleton
Quote.QuoteValue: My success has got so great, it's like I'm trapped, almost, within it

Quote.Author: Victoria Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: I came to acting in a very circuitous way

Quote.Author: Victoria Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: It's all about exploring the more unpredictable aspects in the character, not just fighting people

Quote.Author: Victoria Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: I competed in track for 10 years and have been doing kickboxing forever

Quote.Author: Victoria Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're fighting with a stunt person, your intent is to miss

Quote.Author: Victoria Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: There are a lot of great actresses out there. You learn to appreciate each one for what they offer

Quote.Author: Victoria Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was in university, my dream was to be a coach, like a high school track coach. Not to teach

Quote.Author: Victoria Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I've paid my dues. I've really put in a lot of time on set

Quote.Author: Victoria Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't say that I've made the transition to movies

Quote.Author: Victoria Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been really fortunate to go from series to series to series

Quote.Author: Victoria Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: I would be very happy doing movies. I love to work and I think I'm a little different

Quote.Author: Victoria Principal
Quote.QuoteValue: I went to a woman for advice about how to be in business, but I learned a great deal from men

Quote.Author: Victoria Principal
Quote.QuoteValue: I got even with all the bad management I had by being a good manager

Quote.Author: Victoria Principal
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't strive to be perfect. Strive for excellence

Quote.Author: Victoria Principal
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't be responsible for the way people respond to you. You're only responsible for yourself

Quote.Author: Victoria Principal
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that how you feel is very important to how you look - that healthy equals beautiful

Quote.Author: Victoria Principal
Quote.QuoteValue: Unless we keep this planet healthy, everything else is for naught

Quote.Author: Victoria Principal
Quote.QuoteValue: Ignorance is not bliss, but in my case, that was

Quote.Author: Victoria Principal
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as my body is in shape, my mind is working at its full capacity

Quote.Author: Victoria Principal
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up thinking that whatever I wanted to do, I could do

Quote.Author: Victoria Principal
Quote.QuoteValue: I went to find myself and save myself by being an agent

Quote.Author: Victoria Woodhull
Quote.QuoteValue: While others prayed for the good time coming, I worked for it

Quote.Author: Victoria Woodhull
Quote.QuoteValue: By what right do you refuse to accept the vote of a citizen of the United States?

Quote.Author: Victoria Woodhull
Quote.QuoteValue: Is it fair to treat a woman worse than a man, and then revile her because she is a woman?

Quote.Author: Victoria Woodhull
Quote.QuoteValue: I shall not change my course because those who assume to be better than I desire it

Quote.Author: Victoria Woodhull
Quote.QuoteValue: Woman, no less than man, can qualify herself for the more onerous occupations of life

Quote.Author: Victoria Woodhull
Quote.QuoteValue: To go behind a man's hall-door is mean, cowardly, unfair opposition

Quote.Author: Victoria Woodhull
Quote.QuoteValue: My judges preach against free love openly, practice it secretly

Quote.Author: Victoria Woodhull
Quote.QuoteValue: I endeavor to make the most of everything

Quote.Author: Victoria Woodhull
Quote.QuoteValue: Denounce me for advocating freedom if you can, and I will bear your curse with a better resignation

Quote.Author: Victoria Woodhull
Quote.QuoteValue: Women have no government

Quote.Author: Vidal Sassoon
Quote.QuoteValue: It's okay saying sorry, but when you are drunk you say what you really feel

Quote.Author: Vidal Sassoon
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have a sense of style and purpose and will you don't want to compromise

Quote.Author: Vidal Sassoon
Quote.QuoteValue: I was all about my thoughts, my work, my inspiration. I was always in hair

Quote.Author: Vidal Sassoon
Quote.QuoteValue: You must always do what you feel is right

Quote.Author: Vidal Sassoon
Quote.QuoteValue: The essence is, what can we do next? And will it be good?

Quote.Author: Vidal Sassoon
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't look good, we don't look good

Quote.Author: Vidal Sassoon
Quote.QuoteValue: My greatest regret is selling my company

Quote.Author: Vidal Sassoon
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything about morality and obligations I owe to football

Quote.Author: Vidal Sassoon
Quote.QuoteValue: Judaism is important to me from a tribal point of view

Quote.Author: Vidal Sassoon
Quote.QuoteValue: Capri on the Amalfi Coast in Italy is my ultimate holiday destination

Quote.Author: Vidya Balan
Quote.QuoteValue: I think a woman should be wholesome, voluptuous and sizzling!

Quote.Author: Vidya Balan
Quote.QuoteValue: I take one day at a time. I am not someone to define my goals

Quote.Author: Vidya Balan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm someone who believes in 'live and let live,' and that applies to everything

Quote.Author: Vidya Balan
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the beautiful thing about the past is that it leads you to the present

Quote.Author: Vidya Balan
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't bother about how people feel about me. What matters to me is how I feel about them

Quote.Author: Vidya Balan
Quote.QuoteValue: Women need to learn to value themselves. But that has to be inculcated in men as much as women

Quote.Author: Vidya Balan
Quote.QuoteValue: Thumbs up to the buxom woman. Size zero is boring!

Quote.Author: Vidya Balan
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a happy person before marriage. I'm definitely happier after marriage

Quote.Author: Vidya Balan
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage is something I'd recommend everyone to try, if you find the right person, of course

Quote.Author: Vidya Balan
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't cook to save my life

Quote.Author: Viggo Mortensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I like stories that leave you wanting more, leave you wondering, but don't tell you everything

Quote.Author: Viggo Mortensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not that involved in personal grooming. But I try not to be offensive to people

Quote.Author: Viggo Mortensen
Quote.QuoteValue: In a movie, you're raw material, just a hue of some color and the director makes the painting

Quote.Author: Viggo Mortensen
Quote.QuoteValue: Jung viewed Freud as a mentor, but he never wanted to be anybody's disciple

Quote.Author: Viggo Mortensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no idea what 'method actor' means

Quote.Author: Viggo Mortensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a work ethic. If I say I'm going to do something, I do it

Quote.Author: Viggo Mortensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like the 'must', the 'always', and the 'never' words. I don't like 'no' either

Quote.Author: Viggo Mortensen
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no sense in doing something, especially if it's a hard job, if you can't have a little fun

Quote.Author: Viggo Mortensen
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is short and the older you get, the more you feel it. Indeed, the shorter it is

Quote.Author: Viggo Mortensen
Quote.QuoteValue: The Holocaust movie is almost a genre in itself these days

Quote.Author: Vijay Mallya
Quote.QuoteValue: I live the way I want to live, and I don't comment on the way that other people live

Quote.Author: Vijay Mallya
Quote.QuoteValue: I live life what I consider to be normal

Quote.Author: Vijay Mallya
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not believe in hypocrisy

Quote.Author: Vijay Mallya
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever I do something, it is rooted in the Indian opportunity

Quote.Author: Vijay Mallya
Quote.QuoteValue: Rather than spend millions getting film stars, I am quite happy to be brand ambassador myself

Quote.Author: Vijay Mallya
Quote.QuoteValue: Our culture in India is not a culture where we grudge each other

Quote.Author: Vijay Mallya
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not quite right to be sitting outside India and to be judging what is happening in India

Quote.Author: Vijay Mallya
Quote.QuoteValue: I am pretty tough as a boss

Quote.Author: Vijay Mallya
Quote.QuoteValue: India has given me everything. It has made me Vijay Mallya

Quote.Author: Vijay Mallya
Quote.QuoteValue: I spend my own money, not other people's money

Quote.Author: Vikas Swarup
Quote.QuoteValue: The slums are not a place of despair. Its inhabitants are all working towards a better life

Quote.Author: Vikas Swarup
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to show that the underdog can win. I believe we're all the same: you, a slum girl, my mother

Quote.Author: Vikas Swarup
Quote.QuoteValue: I am neither a Bengali nor am I from Delhi's St Stephen's. I am an Allahabad boy

Quote.Author: Vikas Swarup
Quote.QuoteValue: Mumbai may not be my city. But it is my kind of city

Quote.Author: Vikas Swarup
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes street knowledge can be as important as book knowledge

Quote.Author: Vikas Swarup
Quote.QuoteValue: Global terror does not respect national boundaries

Quote.Author: Vikas Swarup
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't look at myself as a writer; I am a storyteller

Quote.Author: Vikas Swarup
Quote.QuoteValue: I became completely addicted to 'Angry Birds' for a while

Quote.Author: Vikas Swarup
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not into the unrealistic realm of magic realism where birds talk

Quote.Author: Vikas Swarup
Quote.QuoteValue: The writer's is an interior world, a world of the mind

Quote.Author: Vikram Seth
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing about inspiration is that it takes your mind off everything else

Quote.Author: Vikram Seth
Quote.QuoteValue: My main motivation is not to get bored. I'm just hoping I get a vaguely maverick reputation

Quote.Author: Vikram Seth
Quote.QuoteValue: I need my natural laziness to be counteracted by obsession in order to do anything

Quote.Author: Vikram Seth
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think anyone should be banned. If you don't like a book, set it aside

Quote.Author: Vikram Seth
Quote.QuoteValue: I am certainly not allergic to causes - particularly on subjects such as religious intolerance

Quote.Author: Vikram Seth
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not sure anyone can understand a whole life, even their own

Quote.Author: Vikram Seth
Quote.QuoteValue: Good music is good music, but it has to be good

Quote.Author: Vikram Seth
Quote.QuoteValue: You can talk good ideas out of existence

Quote.Author: Vikram Seth
Quote.QuoteValue: I think goodness is about how person behaves to person, and also person to world, to nature

Quote.Author: Vikram Seth
Quote.QuoteValue: Dear though the reader might be, I'd be silly to cater to what the reader wanted

Quote.Author: Viktor Orban
Quote.QuoteValue: The best migrant is the migrant who does not come

Quote.Author: Viktor Orban
Quote.QuoteValue: We should involve the whole world in the handling of this refugee crisis

Quote.Author: Viktor Orban
Quote.QuoteValue: Europe and European identity is rooted in Christianity

Quote.Author: Viktor Orban
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot let Brussels put itself above the law

Quote.Author: Viktor Orban
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't go against the will of the people

Quote.Author: Viktor Orban
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a clear link between illegal migrants coming to Europe and the spread of terrorism

Quote.Author: Viktor Orban
Quote.QuoteValue: Donald Trump has made it clear that he regards Hungary highly

Quote.Author: Viktor Orban
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important thing is to defend the euro

Quote.Author: Viktor Orban
Quote.QuoteValue: The strongest institution in the hands of the European Union is the euro

Quote.Author: Viktor Orban
Quote.QuoteValue: The euro must be defended, or uncertainty about the European Union will be widespread

Quote.Author: Ville Valo
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is always criticized and always an outsider gets the blame

Quote.Author: Ville Valo
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been a huge reggae fan

Quote.Author: Ville Valo
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the funeral of hearts

Quote.Author: Ville Valo
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a collecting maniac and I buy a lot of books and records. I have over thousand cds

Quote.Author: Ville Valo
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a huge fan of James Dean, that got me started. Nowadays I smoke four packs in a day

Quote.Author: Ville Valo
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm living my dream right now. I get to make music, perform and travel

Quote.Author: Ville Valo
Quote.QuoteValue: Women are always beautiful

Quote.Author: Ville Valo
Quote.QuoteValue: Even at school I studied ethics instead of religion

Quote.Author: Ville Valo
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never acted in one and I'm not at all interested to do so either

Quote.Author: Ville Valo
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Johnny Cash but I don't love country music that much

Quote.Author: Vince Flynn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a bit of a Libertarian

Quote.Author: Vince Flynn
Quote.QuoteValue: My doctors warned me repeatedly that if you don't stay positive, you don't do well

Quote.Author: Vince Flynn
Quote.QuoteValue: It's what every writer needs: a daybed

Quote.Author: Vince Flynn
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been blessed to have the same editor and work for a great publishing house

Quote.Author: Vince Flynn
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a lot more to publishing a book than writing it and slapping a cover on it

Quote.Author: Vince Flynn
Quote.QuoteValue: A good football team plays offense and defense. You have to be aggressive and disrupt

Quote.Author: Vince Flynn
Quote.QuoteValue: I just look at what's going on in the world

Quote.Author: Vince Flynn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big believer in free enterprise. If people want to try it, then go for it

Quote.Author: Vince Flynn
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the most talented writers out there is Brian Haig

Quote.Author: Vince Flynn
Quote.QuoteValue: Anybody who knew me growing up calls me Vinny

Quote.Author: Vince McMahon
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest thrill in the world is entertaining the public, there is no bigger thrill than that

Quote.Author: Vince McMahon
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there are certain business matters which we must now conduct differently than we used to

Quote.Author: Vince McMahon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a real common sense guy who caught a lot of good breaks and who has been very, very fortunate

Quote.Author: Vince McMahon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not afraid of failing. I don't like to fail. I hate to fail. But I'm not afraid of it

Quote.Author: Vince McMahon
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you have to take a half step back to take two forward

Quote.Author: Vince McMahon
Quote.QuoteValue: In Europe we could do it, if we fly as soon as the event is over

Quote.Author: Vince McMahon
Quote.QuoteValue: As far as sustaining our popularity, I believe we can

Quote.Author: Vince McMahon
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to do something with my mind, or I'll get in trouble

Quote.Author: Vince McMahon
Quote.QuoteValue: The standards are being lowered, not just on the Internet, but in all of news and media

Quote.Author: Vince McMahon
Quote.QuoteValue: In America it's live by the sword of freedom of expression and be will to die by it as well

Quote.Author: Vince Staples
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was growing up, skateboarding was big and basketball was big

Quote.Author: Vince Staples
Quote.QuoteValue: Circumstances dictate your set of values, your set of morals

Quote.Author: Vince Staples
Quote.QuoteValue: The happiest people, the ones you like the most, they're never worried about being rich

Quote.Author: Vince Staples
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people make their best music when life is horrible

Quote.Author: Vince Staples
Quote.QuoteValue: What's important to me is people just being people

Quote.Author: Vince Staples
Quote.QuoteValue: You're either ghetto or you're not

Quote.Author: Vince Staples
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to captivate and entertain if you want your message to get across

Quote.Author: Vince Staples
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people lose sense of what their music was when their life starts to get better

Quote.Author: Vince Staples
Quote.QuoteValue: Touring helped me understand where I needed to be better in my music

Quote.Author: Vince Staples
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to have an impact because I don't want anybody to have to go through what I went through

Quote.Author: Vince Vaughn
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever you're scared of something, don't let that define you. We all feel it, but step up

Quote.Author: Vince Vaughn
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't worry about being liked. You have to be yourself

Quote.Author: Vince Vaughn
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't own a cell phone for a long time. I was late in the game on that

Quote.Author: Vince Vaughn
Quote.QuoteValue: The last book I read was the book I've been rereading most of my life, The Fountainhead

Quote.Author: Vince Vaughn
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people really like to get into Twitter, but it's not my thing

Quote.Author: Vince Vaughn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a horrible golfer

Quote.Author: Vince Vaughn
Quote.QuoteValue: You'll never meet a nicer guy than Owen Wilson

Quote.Author: Vince Vaughn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Cubs fan. As a kid, the Cubs were my team

Quote.Author: Vince Vaughn
Quote.QuoteValue: As an artist, I can't be responsible for how people interpret material

Quote.Author: Vince Vaughn
Quote.QuoteValue: It's great extremes which leads to great drama and great comedy

Quote.Author: Vincent Bugliosi
Quote.QuoteValue: This is America, not a banana republic

Quote.Author: Vincent Bugliosi
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to finish my book on the Kennedy assassination

Quote.Author: Vincent Bugliosi
Quote.QuoteValue: Just like I'm still angry with Simpson for getting by with two murders

Quote.Author: Vincent Bugliosi
Quote.QuoteValue: So I don't blame Boies for the decision of the Court at all

Quote.Author: Vincent Bugliosi
Quote.QuoteValue: You might not agree with me, but I always offer a lot of support

Quote.Author: Vincent Bugliosi
Quote.QuoteValue: The ruling in the Paula Jones case is so silly

Quote.Author: Vincent Bugliosi
Quote.QuoteValue: It's my view that any conservative who loves his country has to be extremely concerned

Quote.Author: Vincent Bugliosi
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm still angry with Simpson for getting by with two murders
